description: At Aspen, in the Rocky Mountains, U.S.A., an organisation called Blind Outdoor Leisure Development enables blind people to participate in many sports. With experienced guides, 500 blind people are involved in all kinds of sports, including skiing, ice-skating, horseriding, fishing, mountain climbing, rafting in the Colorado rapids, and experiencing wildlife. Narrated by John Denver. Suitable for secondary school level.
